title: Champ Select and In game problems
body:
In game, Lag and Delay.
It seems our internet provider is not the problem here.
When in champion select, champions are not displayed, and i cant choose a champion. 

Anyone else experience this kind of problem?

replies.body:
Cases like this can definitely be [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)  failing to download assets or cause packet loss in game.   Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview and really know for sure.  Even if your ISP is fine, you can still have problems reaching specific services.

If the issues still persist in champion select, enable[ low-spec mode ](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png)which will disable the fancy aesthetics during champion select and load up those assets.  

Should that fail, it's possible that your patcher might not have installed the latest client properly and coming up with corrupt game files.  In that case, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a clean reinstall to fix things up.  Let me know if you have any questions!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5Nr3GuEv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-29T16:21:32.616+0000)
>
> Cases like this can definitely be [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)  failing to download assets or cause packet loss in game.   Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview and really know for sure.  Even if your ISP is fine, you can still have problems reaching specific services.
> 
> If the issues still persist in champion select, enable[ low-spec mode ](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png)which will disable the fancy aesthetics during champion select and load up those assets.  
> 
> Should that fail, it's possible that your patcher might not have installed the latest client properly and coming up with corrupt game files.  In that case, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a clean reinstall to fix things up.  Let me know if you have any questions!

what did you made me do? i tried the hextech repair and now i cant open LoL. it also change to the old logo. now i cant open it. what should i do with the Logs in my desktop? im sooo confused. i just wanted to play :(

That's okay!  It means that you've performed a fresh reinstall but your settings needs to grant league permissions to run and perform an update.  This can happen if you have an overzealous anti-virus or setting blocking it from launching.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help fix that up.  Let me know if you run into any trouble, we'll help get you back in game!
When is riot team bringing back Random select champion button in summoners rift??
